column2: BRIEF-Eastman Completes Tritan Copolyester Expansion May 9 (Reuters) - Eastman Chemical Co: * EASTMAN COMPLETES TRITAN COPOLYESTER EXPANSION AND ANNOUNCES ADDITIONAL INCREASE TO COPOLYESTER CAPACITY * EASTMAN CHEMICAL - ADDITIONAL PLANNED EXPANSION OF COPOLYESTER PRODUCTION TO BE ADDED AT KINGSPORT SITE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Eastman Chemical Co Reports Qtrly EPS Of $2.00 April 26 (Reuters) - Eastman Chemical Co: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.09, REVENUE VIEW $2.46 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $8.47 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
